text: marayam ka beta maseeh ek rasool ke atirikt aur kuchh bhee nahin. usase pahale bhee bahut-se rasool guzar chuke hain. usakee maan atyant satyavatee thee. donon hee bhojan karate the. dekho, ham kis prakaar unake saamane nishaaniyaan spasht karate hai; phir dekho, ye kis prakaar ulate phire ja rahe hai
